verses.name: Psalms 66:1
verses.text: Make a joyful noise unto God, all ye lands:

verses.name: Psalms 66:2
verses.text: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.

verses.name: Psalms 66:3
verses.text: Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 66:4
verses.text: All the earth shall worship thee, and shall sing unto thee; they shall sing to thy name. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 66:5
verses.text: Come and see the works of God: he is terrible in his doing toward the children of men.

verses.name: Psalms 66:6
verses.text: He turned the sea into dry land: they went through the flood on foot: there did we rejoice in him.

verses.name: Psalms 66:7
verses.text: He ruleth by his power for ever; his eyes behold the nations: let not the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 66:8
verses.text: O bless our God, ye people, and make the voice of his praise to be heard:

verses.name: Psalms 66:9
verses.text: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 66:10
verses.text: For thou, O God, hast proved us: thou hast tried us, as silver is tried.

verses.name: Psalms 66:11
verses.text: Thou broughtest us into the net; thou laidst affliction upon our loins.

verses.name: Psalms 66:12
verses.text: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.

verses.name: Psalms 66:13
verses.text: I will go into thy house with burnt offerings: I will pay thee my vows,

verses.name: Psalms 66:14
verses.text: Which my lips have uttered, and my mouth hath spoken, when I was in trouble.

verses.name: Psalms 66:15
verses.text: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 66:16
verses.text: Come and hear, all ye that fear God, and I will declare what he hath done for my soul.

verses.name: Psalms 66:17
verses.text: I cried unto him with my mouth, and he was extolled with my tongue.

verses.name: Psalms 66:18
verses.text: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:

verses.name: Psalms 66:19
verses.text: But verily God hath heard me; he hath attended to the voice of my prayer.

verses.name: Psalms 66:20
verses.text: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
